ValidationRule.description: For APAC Case shouldn't proceed from 'In Photoshooting' status without population of Google_Drive_photo_URL__c field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'FP Entry Case', ISBLANK( Google_Drive_photo_URL__c ), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status ),'In Photoshooting'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'New')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'In Photoshooting') ),ISBLANK(TEXT(Closed_Reason__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate 'Google Drive photo URL' field before move from 'In Photoshooting' status.
